name: Warehouse
description: Sample functions to read from and write data to a warehouse in Fabric.

data.name: Export data from warehouse into a lakehouse
data.description: Use this user data function that writes data from a warehouse into a csv file and saves it in a lakehouse
data.detail: Add a warehouse and lakehouse connection. Then use this sample function that writes data from a warehouse into csv file and saves it in a lakehouse

data.name: Query data from a warehouse
data.description: Use this user data function to query data from a warehouse.
data.detail: Add a warehouse connection to the user data function and then use the function to query data from a warehouse.

name: Lakehouse
description: Sample functions to work with tables and files within a lakehouse in Fabric.

data.name: Read a parquet file from a lakehouse
data.description: This sample reads a parquet file from a lakehouse.

data.name: Write csv file into a lakehouse
data.description: This sample writes a CSV file into a lakehouse using pandas.

data.name: Read csv file from lakehouse
data.description: This sample reads a CSV file from a lakehouse using pandas. Function takes file name as an input parameter.

data.name: Read csv file from lakehouse (Async)
data.description: This sample reads a CSV file from a lakehouse using pandas. Function takes file name as an input parameter. This is an async version of the function.

data.name: Query data from lakehouse tables
data.description: This sample reads data from a table in a lakehouse.

name: SQL Database
description: Sample functions to work with SQL database.

data.name: Write multiple rows of data into a table in SQL database
data.description: This sample allows you to write multiple rows of data into a SQL database.

data.name: Write one row of data into a table in SQL database
data.description: This sample allows you to write one row of data into a SQL database.

data.name: Read data from a table in SQL database
data.description: This sample allows you to read data from SQL database.

name: Data Manipulation
description: Sample functions to transform data using pandas, numpy, and other libraries.

data.name: Manipulate data with pandas library
data.description: This sample uses pandas to manipulate a given dataset to group people by age.

data.name: Filter data using pandas dataframes
data.description: This sample takes as input customers object data as a pandas dataframe type and filters the data based on country.

data.name: Summarize age distribution with pandas Series
data.description: This sample takes a list of ages as a pandas Series object and then summarizes the distribution of ages.

data.name: Transform data with numpy library
data.description: This samples converts the input 1D list to a numpy array. The output is normalized to the range [0, 1] and we calculate the mean.

data.name: Vectorize strings with scikit-learn
data.description: This sample vectorizes a string of text using CountVectorizer and returns a vectorized representation.

data.name: Sentiment analysis with TextBlob
data.description: This sample analyzes sentiment of input text using TextBlob and classifies as Happy, Sad, or Neutral.

data.name: Mask credit card numbers
data.description: This sample masks credit card numbers showing only the last 4 digits for security purposes.

name: UDF Data Types
description: Sample functions to show usage of data types supplied within the SDK library.

data.name: Using UserDataFunctionContext
data.description: This sample uses UserDataFunctionContext to get metadata about the invocation.

data.name: Raising UserThrownError
data.description: This samples raises an error if the age supplied as a parameter is < 18.

name: Cosmos DB
description: Sample functions to show Cosmos DB in Fabric integration.

data.name: Create item in Cosmos DB
data.description: This sample demonstrates how to insert an item into a Cosmos DB container.

data.name: Read item in Cosmos DB
data.description: This sample demonstrates how to read an item from a Cosmos DB container.

data.name: Update item in Cosmos DB
data.description: This sample demonstrates how to update an item in a Cosmos DB container.

data.name: Query items in Cosmos DB
data.description: This sample demonstrates how to query items from a Cosmos DB container.

data.name: Vector search items in Cosmos DB
data.description: This sample demonstrates how to perform vector search on items in a Cosmos DB container.
